simpledb.PageId

    Package Description
    simpledb  

    • Uses of PageId in simpledb

      Classes in simpledb that implement PageId 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HeapPageId
      Unique identifier for HeapPage objects.
      Methods in simpledb that return PageId 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PageId Page.getId()
      Returns the id of this Page.
      PageId RecordId.getPageId() 
      Methods in simpledb with parameters of type PageId 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BufferPool.discardPage(PageId pid)
      Remove the specific page id from the buffer pool.
      Page BufferPool.getPage(TransactionId tid, PageId pid, Permissions perm)
      Retrieve the specified page with the associated permissions.
      boolean BufferPool.holdsLock(TransactionId tid, PageId p)
      Return true if the specified transaction has a lock on the specified page
      Page TestUtil.SkeletonFile.readPage(PageId id) 
      Page HeapFile.readPage(PageId pid) 
      Page DbFile.readPage(PageId id)
      Read the specified page from disk.
      void BufferPool.releasePage(TransactionId tid, PageId pid)
      Releases the lock on a page.
      Constructors in simpledb with parameters of type PageId 
      Constructor and Description
      RecordId(PageId pid, int tupleno)
      Creates a new RecordId refering to the specified PageId and tuple number.
